description:
It is time, once again, to achieve
total Bloon popping satisfaction, this
time in the form of classic TD. With a
whole army of dart monkeys and a
multitude of towers at your disposal
can you pop all of the Bloons ®
before they escape? Bloons ® TD
DSi ™ features all of your favourite
towers and upgrades including the
almighty Super Monkey! Can you
battle your way through 50
challenging levels taking place over
15 exciting tracks and unlock all of
the gold medals to become the TD
master? Good luck!
name: Bloons® TD
